head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PERLEY, ELIZABETH T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PERLEY, ELIZABETH T.

block.p: PERLEY-Elizabeth T. On June 24, 2000 of Rye Brook, New York. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Edward Peter Perley. Beloved mother of Rosemary Perley-Kwauk of Rye Brook, New York, Susan P. Kennedy of Darien, Connecticut, Edward P. Perley of Harrison, New York, William E. Perley of Darien, Connecticut, and the late Elizabeth Perley. Dear sister of Aileen Higgins, Alice Costello, Kathleen Monahan, Madelene Shanahan, Patsy Cumisky, Peggy Swearingen and Eugene Walsh. Loving grandmother of Edward P. Perley III, Timothy J. Perley, Harrison E. Perley, Althea E. Perley and Peter D. Kwauk. The family will receive friends Monday from 2-4PM and 79PM at the William H. Graham Funeral Home, 1036 Boston Post Rd., Rye, NY. Mass of Christian Burial will be Tuesday 10AM at Resurrection Church. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. In lieu of flowers contributions to Greenwich Hospital, 5 Perryridge Rd., Greenwich, CT 06830 would be appreciated.
